item.title: Oh' Canada!: WAKE UP Our Freedoms are at Stake!!! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ June 28, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, Andrew and Matty look at the latest new from around Canada. 

Segment 1 - News Brief:
"Canadian Doctor Admits Govt-Funded Safe Supply Drugs Are Likely Diverted to Children" | LifeSiteNews https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/canadian-doctor-admits-govt-funded-safe-supply-drugs-are-likely-diverted-to-children
"COVID Shots Have 200 Times Higher Risk of Brain Clots Than Other Jabs: New Report" | LifeSiteNews https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/covid-shots-have-200-times-higher-risk-of-brain-clots-than-other-jabs-new-report
"Family of Woman Approved for Government Suicide in Canada Sues Because She Died Before She Was Euthanized" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/family-of-woman-approved-for-government-suicide-in-canada-sues-because-she-died-before-she-was-euthanized
"Trans-Identified Male Awarded $35,000 by Ontario Court After Women's Salon Refused to Wax Her Balls" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/trans-identified-male-awarded-35000-by-ontario-court-after-womens-salon-refused-to-wax-her-balls

Segment 2 - Our Wasteful Federal Government:
"Toronto Police Investigate Rebel News for Potential Hate Crime Over Anti-Muslim Messaging on Advertising Truck" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/toronto-police-investigate-rebel-news-for-potential-hate-crime-over-anti-muslim-messaging-on-advertising-truck;
"Tommy Robinson Arrested by Canadian Police After Speaking at Calgary Free Speech Event" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/tommy-robinson-arrested-by-canadian-police-after-speaking-at-calgary-free-speech-event;
"Tweet by True North Centre" | Twitter https://x.com/rTueNorthCentre/status/1803833841599062350;

Segment 3 - Wokism is Universal Acid and it's Eroding Canada:
"Costs But No Benefits for Companies Embracing ESG" | True North https://tnc.news/2024/06/20/costs-but-no-benefits-for-companies-esg
"Montreal Cancels Canada Day" | The Counter Signal https://thecountersignal.com/montreal-cancels-canada-day
"Names of Foreign Interference Collaborators Released" | True North https://tnc.news/2024/06/23/names-foreign-interference-collaborators-released
